channel.title: 718 Item Bonuses (Rome)
channel.description:
Hey guys. Quick question.
I found an ItemBonusesUnpacker on a different forum, and used it to obviously unpack the item bonuses. After about 15 minutes it had created over 1 million text files at the designated location. I went through and noticed that some of the files actually contained bonuses, but most were just blank text files. I edited the bonuses of the whip file (4151) and re-packed the files. After another 15 minutes I started the server and logged in only to find that all my bonuses were 0.
I have searched Google for about an hour now and haven't found anything related except for the thread where I discovered the ItemBunosesUnpacker.
So my question is how do I do this the right way? :)
thanks, bye bye.

item.title: 718 Item Bonuses (Rome)
item.dc:creator: @Murk3d09 Murk3d09
item.description:
@Murk3d09 wrote:

The Web Guy:

What process did you use for re-packing? Must’ve been done wrong.

The packer included in the server, but I’ve since figured out how to fix it.

Read full topic
